name: Ke-Tsu-No-Ana
description: Ke-tsu-no-ana is Arcade Style Shoot'em Up Game. Grab your joystick Let's Go into The Ke-Tsu-no-ana!!!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 280 / ATI Radeon HD DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space
